content:
If you know of useful mailing lists, newsgroups, forums, or other communities related to PyXPCOM, please link to them here.

ActiveState Python XPCOM bindings mailing list
Discussion of the bindings between the Python language and the XPCOM (cross-platform COM) technology from the Mozilla project.
#pyxpcom on irc.mozilla.org
Chat with other PyXPCOM developers on Mozilla's IRC network.
title: Community
